fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.density

Class DoubleGaussianMixtureModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.density.DoubleGaussianMixtureModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DensityFunction<double[]>, java.io.Serializable

    public class DoubleGaussianMixtureModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements DensityFunction<double[]>

    Gaussian Mixture Model for estimating the density on arrays of double.

    The initialization of the Gaussian centers is performed by k-means, then the EM algorithm runs until the centers stabilize.

    Author:
    picard
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
